mapper.insert: SELECT TOA_ARCHIVE_VERSION_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_archive_version(ID,BACK_UP_ID,FOLDER_ID,DOC_STATE,FILE_TYPE,CONTENT_TYPE,MODEL,collect_ID,DM_LINK,DM_NAME,DM_ALIAS,DM_LOCK_STATUS,Physical_PATH,DM_DIR,DM_TYPE,DM_SUFFIX,WEIGHT,KM_TITLE,DM_IN_RECYCLE,KEY_WORDS,PERMISSION_VALUE,AUTHOR,CURRENT_VERSION,DM_SIZE,SEQ,IS_VALID,PI_ID,OPEN_DATE,KM_END_TIME,KM_KEEP_TIME,KM_REMIND,KM_CONTENT,KM_CLICK_NUM,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5,VERSION_DESC,IS_CURRENT_USED) VALUES (#{id},#{backUpId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{folderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{docState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{model,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{collectId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dmLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmLockStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{physicalPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmInRecycle,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{permissionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{currentVersion,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dmSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{seq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{piId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{kmEndTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmKeepTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmRemind,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kmClickNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{versionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isCurrentUsed,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_version set
BACK_UP_ID = #{backUpId},
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
DOC_STATE = #{docState},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType},
CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType},
MODEL = #{model},
collect_ID = #{collectId},
DM_LINK = #{dmLink},
DM_NAME = #{dmName},
DM_ALIAS = #{dmAlias},
DM_LOCK_STATUS = #{dmLockStatus},
Physical_PATH = #{physicalPath},
DM_DIR = #{dmDir},
DM_TYPE = #{dmType},
DM_SUFFIX = #{dmSuffix},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
KM_TITLE = #{kmTitle},
DM_IN_RECYCLE = #{dmInRecycle},
KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords},
PERMISSION_VALUE = #{permissionValue},
AUTHOR = #{author},
CURRENT_VERSION = #{currentVersion},
VERSION_DESC=#{versionDesc},
DM_SIZE = #{dmSize},
SEQ = #{seq},
IS_VALID = #{isValid},
PI_ID = #{piId},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate},
KM_END_TIME = #{kmEndTime},
KM_KEEP_TIME = #{kmKeepTime},
KM_REMIND = #{kmRemind},
KM_CONTENT = #{kmContent},
KM_CLICK_NUM = #{kmClickNum},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
IS_CURRENT_USED=#{isCurrentUsed}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(t.CURRENT_VERSION) FROM TOA_ARCHIVE_VERSION t WHERE t.BACK_UP_ID=#{backUpId}
